thread.title: Tony the Tiger helps a prostitute in hoax campaign
thread.title_full: Tony the Tiger helps a prostitute in hoax campaign - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Tony the Tiger helps a prostitute in hoax campaign
text:
Tony is Back!/YouTube A moment from a video featuring Tony the Tiger giving frosted flakes to a prostitute. There’s nothing Gr-r-reat about these spoof ads.
In what appears to be an unauthorized online campaign for Tony the Tiger, the famous Kellogg’s Frosted Flakes mascot is trying to help adults who are down on their luck.
In one clip, the cartoon tiger is trying to cheer up a 43-year-old prostitute named Candy who is upset because she feels she’s getting too old for her gig.
